This is your section to give best reflect your model. You can give information about your model or business. It will help your clients/visitors to understand what the model is for. We recommend that you include the business goal and results. You can customize this area from Modelify Console. To edit this section;

  • 1. Go to Your Application Page
  • 2. Click UI Page Tab

On the other hand, if this work is proof of concept, you can give your customers the opportunity to access your model by giving the link to this page. They can get the prediction results from your model using the form on the right sidebar.

Modelifyis ready to help you in all your needs. You can always contact our relevant teams for your questions and opinions.
